text.name: Identity.InvalidUserName
text.value: User name {0} is invalid, can only contain letters or digits.

text.name: Identity.PasswordTooShort
text.value: Passwords must be at least {0} characters.

text.name: Identity.UserAlreadyHasPassword
text.value: User already has a password set.

text.name: Identity.PasswordRequireNonLetterOrDigit
text.value: Passwords must have at least one non letter or digit character.

text.name: Identity.LockoutNotEnabled
text.value: Lockout is not enabled for this user.

text.name: Identity.PasswordRequireUpper
text.value: Passwords must have at least one uppercase ('A'-'Z').

text.name: Identity.PasswordRequireDigit
text.value: Passwords must have at least one digit ('0'-'9').

text.name: Identity.PasswordRequireLower
text.value: Passwords must have at least one lowercase ('a'-'z').

text.name: Identity.ExternalLoginExists
text.value: A user with that external login already exists.
